New Records: Eoin Morgan became the fourth player, and the first Englishman, to play in 100 T20Is
Key Match Events: Eoin Morgan reached a huge milestone in 3rd T20I against India
Pre-Game Insights: England are currently the top-rated T20 team in the world and are among the favorites to win the T20 World Cup, to be held in India later this year
Post-Match Reflections: Since taking over as England's limited-overs captain, Morgan has triggered a huge change in the fortunes of the team
Miscellaneous Highlights: England led by Eoin Morgan is currently playing a five-match T20I series at the Narendra Modi Stadium in Ahmedabad
